patthana21.51:1.1: Nosaññojanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:2.1: Noganthaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:3.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:4.1: Nooghaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:6.1: Noyogaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:8.1: Nonīvaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:10.1: Noparāmāsaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
